segments.text: I notice the woman standing there, drying a plate and completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense that she doesn't even see the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing onto a stool that looks like it could topple any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It infuriates me that she can't sense the danger around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is she not paying attention to her children?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl standing there, eagerly anticipating cookies with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent excitement is almost painful to witness, knowing how risky this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised by how casually they’re breaking the rules, as if it’s just a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is filled with a sense of neglect and chaos, contrasting with the outside calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me question how often this happens when she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR
